version_description:
•Special Event Ticketing - Super Pass available for travel on NJ TRANSIT Rail, Bus, Light Rail and Access Link January 27-February 3, 2014.
•MyTix is available for all NJ TRANSIT rail lines
•App enhancements
App enhancements

Monthly passes are available for many northern and southern New Jersey bus routes
Streamlined ticket display
App enhancements
Bug fixes

Monthly passes are available for all northern and southern New Jersey bus routes
Streamlined ticket display
App enhancements
Bug fixes

• Available for more service lines
• Select favorite stations
• Compatible with iOS7
• Faster launching

•MyTix has been updated and is now a feature of the NJ TRANSIT Mobile App (including Train Schedules,
DepartureVision, MyBus and more)

•Purchase light rail monthly passes (Newark Light Rail, Hudson-Bergen Light Rail or River LINE)

•MyTix accepts PayPal

•MyTix has been updated and is now a feature of the NJ TRANSIT Mobile App (including Train Schedules,
DepartureVision, MyBus and more)

•Purchase light rail monthly passes (Newark Light Rail, Hudson-Bergen Light Rail or River LINE)

•MyTix accepts PayPal

•Purchase one-way interstate bus tickets for select routes
•MyTix Alerts for important ticket information
•App enhancements

•One-Way Interstate bus tickets for all NJ Transit bus routes
•Buy option from Train Schedules trip results
•App enhancements
•Bug Fixes

• Enhanced User Interface
• One-Way, Round-Trip & Ten-Trip Interstate, Intrastate and Intra-Commuter bus tickets for all NJ TRANSIT bus routes
• App enhancements
• Advisories during major service interruption
• Bug Fixes

• Enhanced User Interface
• One-Way, Round-Trip & Ten-Trip Interstate, Intrastate and Intra-Commuter bus tickets for all NJ TRANSIT bus routes
• App enhancements
• Advisories during major service interruption
• Minor Bug Fixes
